mapper.select: SELECT rank_id FROM rank WHERE rank_name = #{ rankName }

SELECT a.user_no , a.user_id , a.password , b.rank_id as "rank.rank_id" , b.rank_name as "rank.rank_name" FROM user a JOIN rank b ON (a.rank_id=b.rank_id) WHERE user_id = #{ userId } AND is_deleted = 'N'
SELECT user_id, email FROM user WHERE email = #{ email } AND is_deleted = 'N'
SELECT b.phone as "user_info.phone" FROM user a JOIN user_info b ON (a.user_no = b.user_no) WHERE b.phone = #{ phone }
SELECT a.user_id , a.user_name , a.email , a.gender , b.birth , b.phone , b.address FROM user a JOIN user_info b ON (a.user_no = b.user_no) WHERE a.user_id = #{ userId } AND a.is_deleted = 'N'

SELECT review_id , target_id , target_type , detail , created_at , rating , user_no FROM review WHERE target_type = #{targetType} AND user_no = #{ userNo } AND is_deleted = 'N' ORDER BY updated_at DESC
